body.name: Miortior Corner Floor Lamp, 2 Pack Smart LED Corner Lamp Works with App/Remote/Button Control, RGB Floor Lamp with 16 Million DIY Colors, 68+ Scene, Music Sync for Living Room, Gaming Room, etc
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 26 mins
features: Create Your Perfect Atmosphere - With 16 million color options and 68 dynamic lighting modes, this RGB floor lamp lets you customize your lighting to match any mood or occasion. Adjust the speed and brightness to bring your space to life in exciting new ways.

Convenient Control Options - Control your corner floor lamp with ease using the included remote control or the Bluetooth app. The app allows you to adjust the color, brightness, and lighting effects to your liking. Plus, the timer function lets you schedule your lighting for any event.

Sync with Your Music - With a built-in sensitive microphone, your LED lights will sync with the rhythm of your favorite music, movies, or games using the Music Voice Control mode. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable experience, and let the lighting enhance your audio-visual entertainment experience.

Simple Installation, Versatile Use - Follow the instructions to install your RGB floor lamp without any tools. This lamp is not only a lighting solution but also perfect for setting the mood. Place it in your living room, bedroom, game room, or any other space you want to enhance.

Reliable Customer Service - At Miortior, we stand behind our products and offer a lifetime warranty service. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. You'll receive RGB Floor Lamp *2, Remote Control *1, 12V/1A Power Adapter *2, and Instruction Manual *1with your purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Create Any Atmosphere with Miortior RGBICW Floor Lamp With 16 million color options and 68 dynamic lighting modes, you can customize your lighting to create the perfect atmosphere in any space. Whether you're looking to set a calming ambiance for meditation or a vibrant atmosphere for a party, this floor lamp has got you covered. Experience unparalleled control over your space's lighting and elevate your living space with Miortior RGBICW floor lamp.

Syncs with Your Entertainment This corner floor lamp goes beyond lighting and enhances your entertainment experience. With its built-in sensitive microphone and Music Voice Control mode, it syncs with your music, movies, or games. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable audio-visual experience that's amplified by the lighting. Let the rhythm of your entertainment ignite a stunning display of light and color for a truly immersive experience.

Timer Settings With our timer switch feature, you can effortlessly schedule your floor lamp to turn on and off at specific times. This allows for a more comfortable sleeping environment for your baby. Say goodbye to fumbling in the dark to turn off the lamp or accidentally leaving it on all night. With our timer setting, you can know that your floor lamp will turn on and off automatically, exactly when you want it to.

Customizable Brightness Experience customizable lighting like never before with our modern floor lamps. With the convenience of remote control and Smart APP, you can easily adjust the brightness from 1% to 100%, allowing you to create the perfect atmosphere for any occasion. Customize to Your Liking With DIY mode, you can set your own colors and modes for a unique and personalized lighting experience. Get creative and have fun achieving the perfect effect you desire. With so many options available, DIY mode is sure to bring you endless joy. Multiple Control Options Enjoy greater convenience with three control methods: smart app control, remote control, and base button control. Choose the method that works best for you and enjoy effortless control over your lighting experience.

Customized for Your Needs Our corner floor lamp is designed to cater to your specific needs, whether it's for your bedroom, living room, game room or party. With our tailor-made solutions, you can easily create the perfect atmosphere in any setting. Whether you're looking for a cozy and relaxing vibe or an energetic and lively mood, our product has got you covered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transformed Our Space: Elegant and Functional!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Miortior Corner Floor Lamp has been an absolute game-changer in our living room! I gifted this to my husband for Christmas, and he promptly installed it, eager to see its impact on our space.The design is sleek and modern, seamlessly fitting into our decor while adding a touch of sophistication. Placed strategically in the corner, it illuminates the room beautifully, creating an ambiance that enhances our TV-watching experience.The soft, ambient glow it casts is perfect for creating a cozy atmosphere, making our movie nights even more enjoyable. The adjustable brightness settings allow for customization, catering to different moods and occasions, whether it's a relaxed evening or a gathering with friends.What sets this lamp apart is its functionality and versatility. The corner placement maximizes space, and its adjustable design ensures that light reaches exactly where it's needed without overpowering the room.The build quality is impressive, sturdy enough to withstand everyday use yet elegant enough to be a statement piece in our living area. It's a seamless blend of form and function, enhancing both the aesthetics and functionality of our space.Since installing the Miortior Corner Floor Lamp, our living room has become a go-to spot not just for watching TV shows and movies but also for relaxation and unwinding after a long day. It has truly transformed the ambiance, adding a layer of sophistication and comfort that we didn't know we were missing.Overall, this lamp has exceeded our expectations. Its elegant design, adjustable lighting, and transformative impact on our living space make it a standout addition to any home. It's more than just a lamp; it's a catalyst for creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere that elevates every moment spent in its glow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wasn’t sure what to think of this light as it didn’t look like much putting it together, which was super easy and took no time at all. This lamp/light is awesome. The colors are good and I was enjoying it and then I discovered I could download an app onto my iPhone. Everything changed after that. This comes with a remote which is nice but the app is unbelievable. It has maybe 75 different modes for the lamp/light. You can add colors, change the speeds and dim the light. Just outstanding. Love this and may order another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and features
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought these as a two pack. Came with one remote and worked perfectly. Also the App works great as well so they can be controlled with my phone. The lights are bright enough with two to illuminate my room without the need for additional lighting. You can control the brightness and many modes. These look great when watching a movie or adding some ambience to a room as well. It is worth noting that they absolutely do not feel like great quality when putting them together. They feel like cheaply made plastic toys…and they probably are, but when they are set up and in a corner doing their job, they look great. So far I can’t complain. I’d recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Miortior Corner Floor Lamp
reviews.reviewText: For the price I know it would be not of the highest quality but here is my honest reviewPros1. Easy to assemble2. breaks down in pieces for easy moving/relocation3. colors are vivid and bright4. the remote is built better than the actual light5. colors are true to description6. Price point is very inexpensive compared to other lamps of this style7. Can build as different sizes. Not all pieces are required to work.Cons:1. Cheap plastic2. comes with small screws and allen wrench would could be easy to lose3. weighted base but could be a little heavier for balance4. the input for the power supply should be on the opposite side of the base unit (personal preference).5. This lamp should be USB powered/rechargeable. LED doesnt use that much power and this would be a nice feature to be able to plug it in for power or have it a portable desk lamp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Easy setup, plenty of color variations, small footprint but big lighting effect. I bought it to use it as ilumination for streaming, and it works perfect. Its built well and looks like it would last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lamps. Excellent choice for decor. Many decoration applications
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these lamps to decorate my bedroom and they're very cool. The included remote is super simple to use, has multiple useful settings, and effects both lamps so I can use a single remote on both of them. The lamps themselves are richly colored and the multiple modes make for many different moods and vibes. I like the setting that detects music and thrums lights with the beat. Combining these corner lamps with other lighting makes for multiple decoration ideas and applications. I'm happy I went with these lamps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected but it’s junky
reviews.reviewText: Honestly this thing is kind of a piece of junk. You can feel it’s cheaply made. It’s just a strip of Led lights in a plastic tube - I was expecting a bulb. It’s bright enough and gets the job done so I’m not returning it but you definitely get what you pay for. The base is sturdy but the rest is cheap. Based off other reviews I got my hopes up that the quality would surprise me but it’s not that cool. The automated sequences are also stupid because it doesn’t let you create your own, you have to use their presets. The app is really hard to us. Terrible ui. And the manual is worthless it’s basically gibberish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: My first gripe is with the assembly instructions. While on the instructions, it identifies the pieces, there are no labels on the pieces to identify them. Couple of them do not align as they should, and I had to swap pieces to see if it would be better aligned. This is the only combination that I found that worked best. Aside from that. It lights up very well and the remote works.

The Miortior Corner Floor Lamp, 2 Pack, has exceeded my expectations in both form and function. The sleek and modern design effortlessly enhances any room, seamlessly fitting into corners to maximize space utilization. The smart LED technology not only provides customizable lighting options but also adds a touch of sophistication to my home. Setting up these lamps was a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly interface and clear instructions. The ability to control the lighting remotely through smart features adds a level of convenience that enhances the overall user experience. With a durable build and energy-efficient LED bulbs, the Miortior Corner Floor Lamp offers a perfect blend of aesthetics and practicality, making it a valuable addition to any contemporary living space.

reviews.reviewTitle: fácil instalación la detección de ruido no es mala el apartado de música q viene en la app no carga
reviews.reviewText: Son algo fragiles, una de mis lámparas tuvo una caída y ahora solo enciende la mitad así que hay que tener cuidado

Constantly would flicker and change colours. Would turn on/off randomly and flicker nonstop unless I unplugged. Would constantly turn on in the middle of the night, change colours and lower brightness. Remote couldn't fix this and was useless, I took the battery out and had same issue with lamps. App didn't work on modern WiFi and couldn't read lamps. Tried unplugging and plugging lamps back in and would constantly flicker and change colours. Thought it was only at night until my neighbor told me it looked like a rave during the day from my house. So all day and night these lights constantly turn off and on to different colours and there's zero answer to fix. I have decided to finally throw them out

reviews.reviewTitle: Very flimsy and the top section never
reviews.reviewText: For the price of these the base unit and the whole set up is very flimsy and falls over very easily. The LED bars you have to put together yourself and on both units. The top bar does not work. And the app to run these lights is not very good wouldn’t suggest buying these

Initially ordered the 2-pack and only received 2 light bases, the plugs, and a remote. Did not receive the light rods so I was a bit disappointed. The seller reached out to me regarding my issue and resolved it immediately. The lights are incredible and add so much character to our living space. Thank you!
